thread.section_title: YourMechanic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YourMechanic | yourmechanic.com
thread.title: Ethan Hernandez

author: Ethan Hernandez
title: Ethan Hernandez
text: Hollywood, Fl area I read a lt of great reviews from other states thinking I'll try it out. I own a dodge stratus ..for the sake of the review ... been canceled on 5 times now ... all for different reasons with 10 minute notice of when they shldve been arriving. I'm giving them the 2 stars because they came finally one time , late without proper tools and took 5 hours to do a 2 hour job .., take ur services else were
